CFG
Class CFG

java.lang.Object
  CFG.CFG

public class CFG
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains all the information of a CFG: function name, nodes, edges, entry, exit, definition, uses, and kills.

getUses

public void getUses(java.util.ArrayList<BasicBlock> basicBlocks)
Go through each nodes and check for uses. If this node contains an use, add to the list uses.

Parameters:
basicBlocks - List of nodes

getDefinitions

public void getDefinitions(java.util.ArrayList<BasicBlock> basicBlocks)
Go through each nodes and check for definition. Each node should only contain ONE definition. If multiple definitions are found, that node will be split into two.

Parameters:
basicBlocks - List of nodes

                       BasicBlock b)
Determines if there is a path between node a to node b

Parameters:
a - Source basic block
b - Destination basic block
Returns:
True if there is a path or false if there is not a path
